title: How To Put Hiren's BootCD On Flash Memory Cleaned
description:
Here is the "How To Put Hiren&#039;s BootCD On Flash Memory" cleaned up from all the trojans and passwords they were using in the previous upload. In the package apart the Autoplay app there is also a standalone package that contains the simple program used to format the USB Key and the Html page with the infos on how to do it.

Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
